name: Untitled boss fight(pls give me a title idea)
name_original: Untitled boss fight(pls give me a title idea)
description:
instructions:

click to the side of the player to dash this will also change the direction of movement for the player

to have to click the missles to destroy them

mouse over regular bullets to detroy them

dodge the lasers

KEYBINDS:

z to pause

x, c, v are the upgrade key binds in the same order as buttons
